bilingual.source: Do you want some butter on your bread?
bilingual.target: 你想在面包上抹点黄油吗？

bilingual.source: First put some butter on a piece of bread.
bilingual.target: 首先在一片面包上抹些黄油。

bilingual.source: First, put some butter on a piece of bread.
bilingual.target: 首先，在一片面包上涂一些黄油。

bilingual.source: Mix the butter and sugar together and then boil the flour and eggs.
bilingual.target: 把黄油和糖混合在一起，然后煮面粉和鸡蛋。

bilingual.source: Dad can cook a super "full English breakfast" of bacon, eggs, beans, sausages and toast with butter.
bilingual.target: 爸爸会做超级“全英式早餐”，包括培根、鸡蛋、豆子、香肠和黄油吐司。

bilingual.source: Dad can cook a super "full English breakfast" of bacon, eggs, beans, sausages and toast with butter if Mum and I can find a way to get him into the kitchen!
bilingual.target: 如果妈妈和我能找到办法让爸爸进厨房，爸爸可以做一顿超级丰盛的“全英式早餐”，包括培根、鸡蛋、豆子、香肠和黄油吐司。
人造黄油比黄油更便宜。

bilingual.source: We use margarine instead of butter for baking.
bilingual.target: 我们用人造黄油代替黄油来烘焙。

list.abstract: butter（英[ˈbʌtə]，美[ˈbʌtər]），英语单词。作名词时，释义为黄油；牛油；酱。作动词时，释义为涂黄油于。短语搭配为peanut butter（花生酱）。例句为All starters are served with bread and butter.（所有的开胃菜都配有面包和黄油。） 其及物动词近义词为kiss up to、soft-sawder；名词性近义词为cream、beurre。
《Butter》是由Jenna Andrews、Rob Grimaldi、Stephen Kirk、RM、Alex Bilowitz、Sebastian Garcia、Ron Perry作词、作曲，防弹少年团演唱的歌曲，于2021年5月21日发行。 2022年5月16日，BTS的《Butter》获2022年公告牌音乐奖最佳畅销歌曲。

yingyinNormal.en: Why do you have tea and Swedish butter cookies?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么会有茶和瑞典黄油曲奇？

yingyinNormal.en: Sunshine, daisies, butter mellow. Turn this stupid, fat rat yellow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阳光，雏菊，黄油飘香，快快把这笨老鼠变黄。

yingyinNormal.en: 25 grams of butter. Now all of this goes on the heat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 25克的黄油，所有这些都要加热一下。

yingyinNormal.en: You made us tea? Oh! Yeah! And I got these Swedish butter cookies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你给我们沏茶了？对呀，还有瑞典黄油曲奇。

yingyinNormal.en: Spread each slice with butter and marmalade. Add a layer of sultanas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每一片上涂满黄油和果酱，加一层葡萄干。

yingyinNormal.en: How about an antique butter churn? Oh, my gosh. That would go so well with my loom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个古董黄油搅拌机怎么样？天哪，那会和我的织布机很般配的。

yingyinNormal.en: A butter churn. That's what I got her. It's for her surprise frontier birthday dinner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黄油搅拌筒。我也要送她那个呢。这是我给她的拓荒者惊喜生日晚餐上要用的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, this morning he used a stick of butter as deodorant. I thought I smelled popcorn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯啊，他今天早上居然把黄油当成了香体剂。我就说怎么闻到了爆米花的味道呢。

yingyinNormal.en: There's less time, because the time has to be spread extra thin over all the places, like butter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但时间没那么多，因为时间会被分成薄薄的片分布在每个地方，就像黄油。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd just like to say that I'm totally behind this experiment. In fact, I'd very much like to butter your head.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想说我完全赞成这个实验，而且，我还非常想把你的脑袋涂上黄油。

yingyinNormal.en: We start with butter and sugar and flour, then we add an egg, and most important of all, the chocolate bits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一步要放黄油，糖，还有面粉，然后还有鸡蛋。最后最重要的是把巧克力放进去。

yingyinNormal.en: We start with butter and sugar and flour, then we add an egg, and most important of all, the chocolate bits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一步要放黄油，糖，还有面粉，然后还有鸡蛋。最后最重要的是把巧克力放进去。

yingyinNormal.en: Sitting outside a café with a strong coffee and a warm croissant with unsalted butter and strawberry jam.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在咖啡馆外面坐着，点一杯最浓的咖啡，还有刚出炉的牛角面包抹上无盐黄油和草莓酱。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, you're sick, go back to bed. I am fine. Here, eat your toast. Sorry. It's okay, now I don't need butter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，你生病，躺回床上吧。我没事。给，吃你的吐司。抱歉。没事，这下黄油都省了。

yingyinNormal.en: Is that butter? Yes. But don't blow it all on one biscuit. Took me nine hours to make that. I think I got churner's elbow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是黄油吗？是啊。但配饼干省着点抹啊。我花了9小时才搅出那么多。可能都得了搅拌者肘。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes? You destroyed me! How so? You turned me into you! That's crazy! No, no, no, that's not crazy. This is crazy. Oh, butter cookies!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你干嘛？都是你，毁了我！此话怎讲？你把我变成了你！这也太疯狂了！不不不，一点都不疯狂，这才叫疯狂！噢，黄油曲奇！

yingyinNormal.en: I can hear my butter, which is all melted together but you'll leave that to cool, because if you put a hot mixture on this, it will kill the yeast instantly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能听到黄油的声音，正在融为一体，但是你得让它冷却，因为如果你把这么热的东西放在上面，就会立即把酵母杀死。

yingyinNormal.en: While it's warm, just drizzle over the top and leave it to soak in for a little bit of tea in the afternoon with a little bit of butter, you will thoroughly enjoy a great malted loaf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 趁着还热，直接倒在上面让它把蜂蜜吸收，再加一点黄油，就可以用来做下午茶的甜点了，你绝对会喜欢这种麦芽面包。

yingyinNormal.en: Judge rules, Nutter-Butter. Oh, tough call. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 裁判判决。是奶油。真的很难决定。

yingyinNormal.en: I always get chocolate and he gets butter brickle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我吃巧克力味，他吃香草味。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: All starters are served with bread and <highlight>butter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有的开胃菜都配有面包和黄油。

examination_example.sentence: From the menu above, we know that bread and <highlight>butter</highlight> goes with starters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从上面的菜单中，我们知道面包和黄油是搭配开胃菜的。

examination_example.sentence: We make it with bread, <highlight>butter</highlight>, and colorful sugar called "Hundreds and thousands".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们用面包、黄油和被称为“成百上千”的彩色糖制作它。
